mapper.select: SELECT id, short_code, original_url, short_link_url, access_count, created_at, updated_at FROM sys_short_link WHERE original_url = #{originalUrl} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_short_link (id, short_code, original_url, short_link_url, access_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{shortCode}, #{originalUrl}, #{shortLinkUrl}, #{accessCount}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_short_link SET access_count = access_count + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE short_code = #{shortCode}
